name: NEON DASHER PROTOTYPE
description:
! WARNING !

POTENTIALLY TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.

CONTROLLER:
MOUSE & LEFT KEY

Minimal hyper-casual platformer skill-based game.
Just like [Helicopter/Flappy Bird] on steroids!

The game experience is laying on spamming up players' senses [Audio/Visual], to make them re-organize and define a wider perception and be able to follow the sensory overload. Which is mostly related to stress behaviors.

Prototype created for educational purposes only, feel free to watch the trailer.

I challenge you to experience it, contact me, or even buy a coffee ;)
